Message:
I couldn’t believe my eyes...
How could someone as sweet
as Elaine do such a thing...?

Yeah... A demon must have
wormed its way into her heart...!
Surely, that was why she...

While we were still stuck in shock,
the two of them vanished
before we could even register
what had happened.

Those of us who remained
split into two groups.

The Hero of the Lance
believed we should continue
seeing our mission through,

while Artoria was adamant
we should chase after Elaine
and take our revenge.

Artoria had looked up
to the Hero of the Staff.
But, she’d likely held
stronger feelings for him
than just that...

Bonds are the very thing that
give humanity the power to
face off against demons.

But, from that day on,
our hearts were divided...

With our destination undecided,
we still tried to walk
through a new “door.”

However, that only caused
the world to fling us in
every which direction...
